Implements the various MIR-based passes. The entry point is the applyPasses procedure.

Imports

../ast/ast_query, ../ast/ast_types, ../ast/types, analysis, mirchangesets, mirconstr, mirtrees, sourcemaps, ../sem/aliasanalysis, ../utils/idioms, ../sem/aliases, ../front/options

Types

TargetBackend = enum
  targetC, targetJs, targetVm
The backend that is going to consume the MIR code. Used to select what passes to run.   Source   Edit

Procs

proc applyPasses(tree: var MirTree; source: var SourceMap; prc: PSym;
                 config: ConfigRef; target: TargetBackend) {.
    ...raises: [Exception, KeyError, ERecoverableError], tags: [RootEffect].}
Applies all applicable MIR passes to the body (tree and source) of prc. target is the targeted backend and is used to enable/disable certain passes.   Source   Edit
